content: My sister-in-law graduates boot camp on May 22 and she said recently in a letter that she was going to be fitted for her dress blues, so I asked her if she was graduating as the guide and she said no. My question is wasn't the only one to be fitted for dress blues was the guide, at least it was when I went to boot camp in 99 which wasn't that long ago. I'm just wondering if she is trying to make it a surprise by not telling anyone. Does anyone know something different??

content: I was not awareyou could get your uniform tailored before you graduated boot camp. The only thing on my mind was graduating and getting out of there! The DI was ticked because the company I was in did not get any flags for drill. Ours was the only one who didn't any, we got the I flag, we did well on all written test's. Ours was the only company who had the I flag. We couldn't march for beans, but we were the smartest company. The DI only cared about drills, he was ticked! Oh well! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
